title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-host LLMs locally with a single CLI or Docker run; ships Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma, etc.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; works in Node & browsers via fetch.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama; pip install ollama, sync & async APIs.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to run Ollama models as LLMs, embedders or tools inside chains.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama; no API keys, fully local.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; Maven Central artifact.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community Ruby gem for Ollama; wraps chat, embed and pull APIs.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns Ollama models into inline code copilot.

title: ollama-cli-chat
summary: Interactive CLI chat with markdown, history, and prompt templates.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes: FastAPI backend, Next.js chat, Discord bot, Home-Assistant agent, etc.

title: ollama-nest
summary: NestJS module that exposes Ollama as injectable services with RxJS streams.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin to summarize notes, brainstorm ideas, or translate via local Ollama models.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Official one-liner Docker Compose with GPU support and persistent model cache.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate providing async client for Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-streamlit-chat
summary: Streamlit app template for chatting with Ollama models; deploy to HuggingFace Spaces.

title: ollama-llamaindex
summary: LlamaIndex reader & generator nodes backed by Ollama; build local RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-host Discord bot that answers questions using any Ollama model.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module to run Ollama in CI pipelines for LLM-based testing or doc generation.
